DOC.brief_summary: A single bout Interval-Walking ( IW ) exercise superior energy-expenditure time-duration match Continuous Walking ( CW ) exercise upon improve glycemic control . The reason IW superior unknown . This study look whether large peak intensity IW alternate exercise pattern responsible large improvement see . Subjects type 2 diabetes include crossover , counter-balanced , control study , subject undergo three trial . Trials identical except follow intervention : 1 . One hour rest ( Con ) 2 . One hour classical interval walking ( repeat cycle 3 min fast 3 min slow walking ; IW3 ) 3 . One hour fast alternate interval walking ( repeat cycle 1 min fast 1 min slow walking ; IW1 ) . After intervention subject undergo standardize mixed meal tolerance test , consecutive measurement blood glucose , insulin c-peptide .
DOC.brief_title: The Features Behind Beneficial Effects Interval-walking
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Body mass index > 18 < 40 m2/kg Agreement pause antidiabetic medication 2 day trial Pregnancy Smoking Use exogenous insulin Contraindication increase level physical activity Evidence thyroid , liver , lung , heart kidney disease
